TopicTitle: Game almost stops completely on load of Mun base.

Articles.Content:
Output log

Just wanted to get that out of the way.

Description:

Now, i have issues on my main career.

The FPS pretty much drops to 1 frame every 4-6 seconds when i either go to my Mun base via Tracking station, or if i get within 2.3km of the base with another craft causing it to load.

I've tried to approach with a regular spacecraft, and then i've approached with just a kerbal to make sure it was not a spacecraft setting this off.

Last thing i did on the base was to connect a Karbonite Drilling platform with 1 tiny docked ship (6 Parts) to a 4 module based colony from MKS (+7 modules, 4 Habitation, 3 Agriculture) with KAS'es Ground Pylons and Pipe end points.

I had no issues with this base while the drilling platform and the Colony was separated, and when i connected them i had no issues right away, everything was perfectly fine near i can tell, but when i tried to rendevouz with a ship it started semi-freezing. Pressing esc did pause the game after a few seconds and brought up the menu so i could go to the space center, which instantly "fixed" the problem.

I tried revisiting the ship, and also to visit the base directly. But in both situations the FPS problems returned whenever the colony was loaded.

I believe the entire colony is about 100-150 parts. Also it might be worth mentioning that the drilling platform and the colony is set a bit apart ~300m, which required 8 KAS ground pylons at close to max range distance to link up.

Reproduction:

The colony itself took many hours to build, and im unsure of all the parts used. so i can't reliably reproduce this bug in another save.

All of these mods where downloaded less than 4 days ago.

Modlist:

[0.24.2] TAC Life Support v0.10

[0.24.2] KSP Alternate Resource Panel v2.5.1.0

[0.24.2] Universal Storage 0.8.4

[0.24.2]NEAR: A Simpler Aerodynamics Model v1.1.1

[0.24.2] Procedural Fairings 3.09

[0.24.2] CoolRockets! Cryo and Launch Particle FX v.05

[unknown] HotRockets! Particle FX Replacement + Tutorial (Unknown version, Last edit by Nazari indicates his thread for this mod was last updated 24th of August)

[0.24.2] RemoteTech 2 v1.4.1

[0.24.2] Deadly Reentry Continued v5.2

[0.24.2] Kerbal Attachment System KAS 0.4.8

[0.24] USI Survivability Pack v0.1.1

[0.24.2] USI Kolonization Systems (MKS/OKS) 0.21.1

[0.24.2] Extraplanetary Launchpads v4.2.3

[0.24.2] Karbonite - Mineable, Burnable, and Community-Driven 0.4.1
